summary: A pseudo-documentary on the life of Yves Montand, who plays himself, in this tribute to his long career. During a musical tour, Montand returns to Marseille and revisits the many highlights... See full summary »
cast: Yves Montand|Mathilda May|Patrick Fierry|Françoise Fabian|Morad Anekkar|Jean-Claude Bouillaud|Antoine Bourseiller|Christophe Bourseiller|Geoffrey Carey|Sophie Castel|Raoul Curet|Mathieu Demy|Danielle Durou|Marie Dô|Bruno Glasberg|Thierry Gondet|Paul Guers|Bertrand Lacy|Catriona MacColl|Pierre Maguelon|Christiane Minazzoli|Carlo Nell|Georges Nery|Jacques Nolot|Victoria Obermayer|Géraldine Pailhas|Gille Rizzo|Jean-Louis Rolland|Jean-Pierre Spano|Hélène Surgère|Jean-Benoît Terral|Dominique Varda|Katy Varda|Joëlle Vautier
title: Trois places pour le 26
